title: Accidentally spent RP
body: I accidentally spent RP instead of IP on teemo because I was planning to get Omega Squad teemo with the 2000 RP i have, instead i went to go buy the champion with RP instead, is there a way to refund this?

replies.body: Sorry to hear about the accidental purchase, though we might be able to help.  First, per our [refund](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ) guidelines you should be able to process a refund if you have any tokens left.  If you're out of tokens, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  I can't make any guarantees, but our billing team likes to look at each case individually.  I hope that helps!
Oh thank god, I didn't want to use $5 more, Thank you so much.
